channel.title: Camping on CamMakoJ
channel.description: Recent content in Camping on CamMakoJ

item.title: Camping in Alberta
item.description: I love getting out of town and camping. It’s just so nice to spend all day outside and finish the night around a campfire and fall asleep in a tent to the quiet sounds of a stream. It was super nice to get out and fish with my dad as well. We were lucky enough to get into a few brown trout, which are my favourite. I was hoping with the warm weather we would be able to have some success on the dry, but they were only sub-surface feeding while we were there.
